mapper.sql: drug_id, drug_serial_number, drug_item_no, generic_drug, dosage_form, specification, units, conversion_factor, enterprise_id, trade_name, the_price, approval_number, approval_number_date, whether_import, packaging, packing_unit, latest_retail_price, Source_price, level_id, quality_hierarchy, inspection_report, drug_inspection, drug_inspection_report, dc_id, descrip_id, description, isdel, proxy_id
mapper.select: SELECT d.*,u.units_id,u.units AS uunits,u.units_fid,e.enterprise_id as eenterpriseId, e.enterprise_name,e.business_license,e.registration_time, q.level_id as qlevelId,q.level_type, dr.dc_id as drdcId,dr.drug_type,dr.state, s.drug_id as sdrugId,s.Review_results,s.supply_id AS ssuplyId,s.supplier_id AS ssupplierId,s.Drug_transaction_status,s.isdel, su.supplier_id AS suSupplier,su.Supplier_name,su.business_license, su.Registration_time,pu.result,pu.drug_id AS puDrugID FROM drug_information_sheet d LEFT JOIN units u ON d.units= u.units_id LEFT JOIN enterprise e ON d.enterprise_id =e.enterprise_id LEFT JOIN quality_level q ON d.level_id=q.level_id LEFT JOIN drug_category dr ON dr.dc_id=d.dc_id LEFT JOIN supplier_management s ON d.drug_id=s.drug_id LEFT JOIN supplier su ON s.supplier_id = su.supplier_id LEFT JOIN purchase pu ON pu.drug_id=d.drug_id WHERE d.proxy_id=1 AND s.Drug_transaction_status=1

SELECT d.*,u.units_id,u.units AS uunits,u.units_fid,e.enterprise_id as eenterpriseId, e.enterprise_name,e.business_license,e.registration_time, q.level_id as qlevelId,q.level_type, dr.dc_id as drdcId,dr.drug_type,dr.state, s.drug_id as sdrugId,s.Review_results,s.supply_id AS ssuplyId,s.supplier_id AS ssupplierId,s.Drug_transaction_status,s.isdel, su.supplier_id AS suSupplier,su.Supplier_name,su.business_license, su.Registration_time,pu.result,pu.drug_id AS puDrugID FROM drug_information_sheet d LEFT JOIN units u ON d.units= u.units_id LEFT JOIN enterprise e ON d.enterprise_id =e.enterprise_id LEFT JOIN quality_level q ON d.level_id=q.level_id LEFT JOIN drug_category dr ON dr.dc_id=d.dc_id LEFT JOIN supplier_management s ON d.drug_id=s.drug_id LEFT JOIN supplier su ON s.supplier_id = su.supplier_id LEFT JOIN purchase pu ON pu.drug_id=d.drug_id WHERE d.proxy_id=1 AND s.Drug_transaction_status=0

SELECT d.*,u.units_id,u.units AS uunits,u.units_fid,e.enterprise_id as eenterpriseId, e.enterprise_name,e.business_license,e.registration_time, q.level_id as qlevelId,q.level_type, dr.dc_id as drdcId,dr.drug_type,dr.state, s.drug_id as sdrugId,s.Review_results,s.supply_id AS ssuplyId,s.supplier_id AS ssupplierId,s.Drug_transaction_status,s.isdel, su.supplier_id AS suSupplier,su.Supplier_name,su.business_license, su.Registration_time FROM drug_information_sheet d LEFT JOIN units u ON d.units= u.units_id LEFT JOIN enterprise e ON d.enterprise_id =e.enterprise_id LEFT JOIN quality_level q ON d.level_id=q.level_id LEFT JOIN drug_category dr ON dr.dc_id=d.dc_id LEFT JOIN supplier_management s ON d.drug_id=s.drug_id LEFT JOIN supplier su ON s.supplier_id = su.supplier_id WHERE proxy_id=1 AND d.drug_id=#{drugId}
mapper.update: UPDATE drug_information_sheet SET trade_name=#{tradeName}, approval_number=#{approvalNumber}, approval_number_date=#{approvalNumberDate}, whether_import=#{whetherImport}, packaging=#{packaging}, packing_unit=#{packingUnit}, latest_retail_price=#{latestRetailPrice}, Source_price=#{SourcePrice}, level_id=#{leveId}, quality_hierarchy=#{qualityHierarchy}, inspection_report=#{inspectionReport}, drug_inspection=#{drugInspection}, drug_inspection_report=#{drugInspectionReport}, description=#{description} WHERE drug_id=#{drugId}
mapper.select: SELECT dsi.drug_item_no, dsi.generic_drug, dsi.dosage_form, dsi.specification, ui.units, dsi.conversion_factor, dc.drug_type, dsi.descrip_id FROM drug_information_sheet dsi LEFT JOIN units ui ON dsi.units = ui.units_id LEFT JOIN drug_category dc on dsi.dc_id=dc.dc_id;
